txt.en: Enârshan has provided you with the Idâmi concoction to use on the supplies in Khûn Sagaz to weaken them. She also instructed you to take from them any weapons you find.

'You are back. Were you able to find success in Khûn Sagaz?'

Enârshan smiles slightly as you give her the weapons you took and confirm that you used her concoction on the supplies.

'Wonderful news. I believe we are nearing our goal.

'You have done well.'
Return to Enârshan in the Falls of Ilûritu and let her know you have used her concoction on the supplies and taken what weapons you could.
Enârshan has asked you to sabotage the supplies in Khûn Sagaz with the Idâmi concoction as well as take as many of their weapons as you can.

'Ah, you are here. Good. Everything is now ready.'

Enârshan hands you the concoction she crafted.

'Take this concoction and pour it over their supplies within Khûn Sagaz. I also ask that you take any weapons you can from them.

'This will give us the advantage we need to drive them away at last. My falls will soon be free with your help.'
Ah, you are here. Good. Everything is now ready.
